name: Driller Bunny
description:
Super-simple tilt controls guide Driller Bunny's tunneling through 60 levels, 3 unique worlds, and tons of replayable fun.


Key Features:
★ simple, responsive tilt controls
★ cool powerups to collect like bombs
★ custom graphics and unique new items
★ custom music for each world
★ store collected gems in your vault
★ Gamecenter achievements and leaderboards
★ lots of updates with new worlds and levels
